title.narrative: Enhanced Nutrition for Mothers and Children

description.narrative: The development objective for the project is to increase the coverage, in Project areas, of interventions that are known toimprove the nutritional status of children under two years of age, of pregnant and of lactating women.

participating-org.narrative: Department of Health, Government of KP

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Annual Work plan | Description :Prepare and adopt by not later than May 31 of each year, an annual work planand budget (the “Annual Work Plan and Budget”) for the following fiscal year in a manner and substance satisfactory to theAssociation, which shall identify the Project activities by component and subcomponent, together with their related expendituresand financing sources. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :District Coordination Committee | Description :Establish, by no later than two (2) months after the EffectiveDate, and thereafter maintain throughout the period of Project a District Coordination Committee in each of Project Districts,chaired by the District Health Officer of the respective districts | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :District Nutrition Officer | Description :Maintain throughout the period of Project implementation a DistrictNutrition Officer in in each of the Project Districts, with terms of references satisfactory to the Association, responsible for,inter alia, coordination of implementation, monitoring and reporting at the respective district. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Grant Agreement: Section II, A1 | Description :Project Report furnished to the Association not later than 45days after the end of the period covered by the report | Frequency :SemiAnnual

Finance Agreement :Institutional arrangements for internal audits | Description :The Province of Sindh shall, by no later than six(6) months after the Effective Date, establish and thereafter maintain through out the period of Project implementation,institutional arrangements for internal audits, including inventory management, within the Department of Health, in a manner andsubstance acceptable to the Association. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Procurement Complaint System | Description :establish, by no later than four (4)months after the Effective Date,and thereafter maintain throughout implementation a system for the handling of procurement complaints, which shall include, themaintenance of a complaint database, a standard protocol setting forth triggers for carrying out investigations, and a sanctionsregime | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Procurement Documentation and Record keeping System | Description :establish, by no later than four (4)monthsafter Effective Date, and maintain throughout the period of Project implementation a procurement documentation and record keepingsystem, including a publicly accessible website, showing Project procurement plans, complete bidding documents, status ofprocurement of various contracts ,contract performance, payment delays, and a list of procurement delays | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Project Agreement: Section I, A(1) | Description :Project implementation unit (PIU) with composition, staffing,and resources acceptable to the Bank | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
Finance Agreement :Project Agreement: Section I, A(1) | Description :Provincial Steering Committee with a mandate, composition,staffing, and resources acceptable to the Bank | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
Finance Agreement :Project Agreement: Section I, A(1) | Description :Provincial Technical Committee with a mandate, composition,staffing, and resources acceptable to the Bank | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
Finance Agreement :Project Agreement: Section I, A(2) | Description :Internal audit Function established within DoH | Due Date:29-Jun-2018
Finance Agreement :Project Agreement: Section I, A(3) | Description :Appointment of Procurement Specialist for PIU | Due Date:28-Feb-2018
Finance Agreement :Project Agreement: Section I, D | Description :Grievance redress mechanism | Due Date :30-Mar-2018
Finance Agreement :Project Agreement: Section I, C | Description :Carry out a social vulnerability and service delivery assessment| Due Date :30-Mar-2018

Finance Agreement :Provincial Steering Committee, Sindh | Description :Establish, by no later than two (2) months after theEffective Date, and thereafter maintain throughout the period of Project implementation, a Provincial Steering Committee chaired bythe Additional Chief Secretary of the Province of Sindh | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Provincial Technical Committee, Balochistan | Description :Establish, by no later than two (2) months after theEffective Date, and thereafter maintain throughout the period of Project implementation, a Provincial Technical Committee, chairedby the Director General of Health Services of the Department of Health, Balochistan | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Six monthly Project Report | Description :Each Project Report shall cover the period of six months, and shallbe furnished to the Association not later than forty five (45) days after the end of the period covered by such report. | Frequency:Quarterly
